page.title: 04Shops
page.content: There are two shops in Steeple Morden the Post Office in Cheyney Street & the country store in Hay Street. The Post Office: The Post Office sells fishing licenses,Giro bank,dog licenses,stamps ,sweets,wool,toys,games,models, stationary,pensions,and other benefits.The postman comes to collect the letters at 09:00am,11:00am,05:30pm The postbox in the Post Office is made of oak it is one of the few left in the country. The Country Store: The Country Store sells dairy produce,packet & tinned food,frozen food,fresh veg. & fruit,fresh bread, domestic goods ,stationary,toys, video club,cakes,ice-cream,cigarettes and tobacco,spirits,wines and beers, soft drinks,pharmaceutical with doctors box fresh cold meats and eggs
